item.title: [Hot] New entry (#17): mcp-builder
item.description: New entry in Hot leaderboard. Rank: #17 Installs: 17 Source: anthropics/skills Description: Guide for creating high-quality MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers that enable LLMs to interact with external services through well-designed tools. Use when building MCP servers to integrate external APIs or services, whether in Python (FastMCP) or Node/TypeScript (MCP SDK).

Styles: glassmorphism, claymorphism, minimalism, brutalism, neumorphism, bento grid, dark mode, responsive, skeuomorphism, flat design. Topics: color palette, accessibility, animation, layout, typography, font pairing, spacing, hover, shadow, gradient. Integrations: shadcn/ui MCP for component search and examples.

item.title: [Trending] Rank down (1 → 3): find-skills
item.description: Trending leaderboard rank change. Previous rank: #1 Current rank: #3 Delta: -2 Installs: 6960 (prev 7164) Source: vercel-labs/skills Description: Helps users discover and install agent skills when they ask questions like "how do I do X", "find a skill for X", "is there a skill that can...", or express interest in extending capabilities. This skill should be used when the user is looking for functionality that might exist as an installable skill.
